comment.author: 57668330@N00
comment._content: If Eleanor Robson Belmont is in this photo, I think Bain may have misplaced his "X" - the woman at far left looks more like the photo included in her Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eleanor_Robson_Belmont Assuming this was taken ca. 1910, she would have been in her early 30s.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: rockcreek: Looks like you are correct.  We will make a note of it in the source data and reload the description.

comment._content: It may be worth double-checking if the woman at center is Mrs. August Belmont Sr. - perhaps she was still alive at the time? I'm not able to find an image of her online at the moment.
